thread.title: Bob Ong
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Bob Ong

author: Bob Ong
title: Bob Ong
text: The Toyota Estima given us for the Christchurch Queenstown trip from 20March to 24March was in excellent condition and all 6 of us were very pleased. We didn't expect a new car but the car was certaintly not old n riggity. Your Christchurch staff esp Melanie was extremely helpful. Thank you.
